github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate a commit message for the staged changes following conventional-changelog angular style. Use the format: type(scope): description. Valid types include: build, ci, docs, feat, fix, perf, refactor, style, test, chore. Focus on the key modifications and their purpose, avoiding unnecessary details. If the changes are complex or significant, also provide a commit description explaining the reasoning or impact.
